results.description: Basel striker Ricky van Wolfswinkel is undergoing treatment for a brain aneurysm that was only discovered after he had scans following a concussion.

results.description: Swiss striker Albian Ajeti signs a four-year contract at West Ham, joining the Premier League club for £8m from Basel.

results.description: A Grasshopper Zurich match is abandoned for the second time in two months, with the club facing relegation from the Swiss top flight.
